Course Description: THIS COURSE COVERS TOOLS USED BY MANAGEMENT FOR COST REPORTING AND CONTROL INCLUDING STATEMENTS, ANALYTICAL TOOLS, AND REPORTS.
Objectives / Learning Outcome(s) / Major:
LEARNING OUTCOMES: 

UPON COMPLETION OF THIS COURSE, STUDENTS WILL BE ABLE TO:

1. SOLVE DIVERSE BUSINESS PROBLEMS USING MANAGERIAL ACCOUNTING VOCABULARY
2. USE MANAGERIAL ACCOUNTING TECHNIQUES TO PRODUCE DATA FOR PLANNING AND DECISION MAKING
3. DEVELOP BUDGETS, COSTING SYSTEMS AND CAPITAL INVESTMENT PLANS BY SYNTHESIZING AND ANALYZING INFORMATION
4. MAKE RECOMMENDATIONS TO MANAGEMENT SUPPORTING STRATEGIC AND TACTICAL PLANNING
